item.title: 印度股市指标测试关键支撑位，超卖信号不断增强
item.description: 印度NSE Nifty 50指数周三短暂跌破200日移动平均线，这是自5月以来首次跌破这一常被视为支撑位的水平。【原文：India’s NSE Nifty 50 Index briefly slipped below its 200-day moving average Wednesday for the first time since May, breaching a level that has often served as support.】

item.title: 红牛罐装饮料销量创疫情以来最快增速，SN称
item.description: 据《萨尔茨堡新闻报》报道，红牛公司去年蓝银标识能量饮料销量创三年来最大增幅，推动其营收和营业利润双双创下历史新高。【原文：Red Bull GmbH increased sales of its blue-silver labeled energy drink by the most in three years, boosting revenue and operating profit to a record last year, according to Salzburger Nachrichten newspaper.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德认为加征关税对通胀影响有限
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜·拉加德表示，美国总统唐纳德·特朗普的又一轮关税措施对欧洲通胀的影响将微乎其微。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said another volley of tariffs from US President Donald Trump would have only a minor impact on inflation in Europe.】

item.title: 阿拉伯能源基金计划发行罕见熊猫债券，规模最高达14亿美元
item.description: 阿拉伯能源基金已获得中国监管机构批准，将通过发行人民币债券筹集最高100亿元人民币（合14亿美元），这为可能成为中东地区最大熊猫债券计划之一铺平了道路。【原文：The Arab Energy Fund has received regulatory approval in China to raise up to 10 billion yuan ($1.4 billion) through yuan‑denominated bonds, paving the way for what could be among the largest panda bond programs from the Middle East.】

item.title: 英国基础设施企业受益于政府支出计划
item.description: 英国基础设施企业正展现乐观前景，工党政府的基建战略正为其订单簿持续注入活力。【原文：British infrastructure firms are providing upbeat outlooks as the Labour government’s infrastructure strategy fills up their order books.】

item.title: 百货连锁企业将销售停滞归咎于印度空气污染
item.description: 据印度领先百货连锁企业Shoppers Stop Ltd.称，2025年末印度北部地区空气污染急剧恶化，对消费者需求造成冲击。该公司表示，空气污染问题是影响销售增长的诸多因素之一。【原文：A spike in air pollution across northern India in the final months of 2025 impacted consumer demand, according to Shoppers Stop Ltd., a leading department store chain which said the issue was among factors that weighed on sales growth.】

item.title: 印尼央行维持基准利率不变，此前印尼盾跌至历史最低点
item.description: 印度尼西亚央行维持基准利率不变，以保护印尼盾汇率。本周印尼盾汇率因持续的财政担忧和对央行独立性日益增长的忧虑而跌至历史最低点。【原文：Bank Indonesia held its benchmark interest rate steady to safeguard the rupiah, which this week fell to a record low on persistent fiscal worries and growing concerns over the central bank’s independence.】

item.title: 欧盟在特朗普威胁后视印欧贸易协定为"历史性"协议
item.description: 欧盟委员会主席表示，欧盟与印度即将达成一项"具有历史意义"的贸易协议。在面对美国总统特朗普不断升级的关税威胁之际，双方正寻求加强合作关系，以提振各自经济。【原文：The European Union and India are nearing a “historic” trade agreement, the bloc’s chief said, as both sides look to strengthen ties and bolster their economies in the face of rising tariff threats from US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 中国债券拍卖需求创纪录，全球风险加剧
item.description: 中国周三发行的七年期国债需求强劲，投资者无视全球市场隔夜的波动，争相认购该债券。【原文：China’s sale of seven-year government bonds drew robust demand on Wednesday as investors shrugged off the overnight volatility in global markets to scoop up the debt.】

item.title: 日本工会联合会主席呼吁政府稳定外汇汇率与物价
item.description: 日本最大工会组织领导人敦促高市早苗内阁稳定货币和物价，因通胀持续冲击家庭和劳动者。【原文：The leader of Japan’s largest labor union group urged Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s government to stabilize currencies and prices, as inflation continues to hit households and workers.】

item.title: 新世界计划于六月前出售资产以实现正现金流
item.description: 知情人士透露，新世界发展正加紧在6月底前出售至少一项资产，以达成其自设的270亿港元（35亿美元）销售目标，并实现正现金流。【原文：New World Development Co. is racing to offload at least one asset by the end of June to meet its self‑imposed HK$27 billion ($3.5 billion) sales target and generate positive cash flow, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 南非部长撤回气候融资承诺
item.description: 南非电力部长科西恩索·拉莫科帕表示，由于成本高昂且附加诸多条件，南非不愿动用世界部分最富裕国家提供的数十亿美元气候资金。【原文：South Africa is reluctant to tap billions of dollars in climate finance offered by some of the world’s richest nations because of the cost and strings attached, Electricity Minister Kgosientsho Ramokgopa said.】

item.title: 假日期间博柏利销售额攀升，中国市场回暖
item.description: 巴宝莉在关键假日期间的销售额实现增长，消费者争相抢购该英国品牌的格纹围巾和风衣，提振了中国奢侈品市场复苏的希望。【原文：Burberry’s sales advanced over the key holiday period as shoppers snapped up the British brand’s tartan scarves and trench coats, bolstering hopes of a luxury rebound in China.】

item.title: 英国通胀率升至3.4%，预计为暂时性回升
item.description: 英国通胀率五个月来首次加速上升，但预计这种回升将是暂时的，因为政府措施将在春季缓解价格压力。【原文：UK inflation accelerated for the first time in five months, a pickup that’s expected to prove temporary with government measures set to dampen price pressures in the spring.】

item.title: 绿色软件初创企业获12亿美元融资 加速欧盟太阳能业务扩张
item.description:
新一轮融资正值欧盟范围内住宅安装量持续下滑之际。 

【原文：

The new funding round comes as residential installations are declining across the bloc. 

】

item.title: 桥水基金中国股票持仓激增45%后看涨中国股市
item.description: 桥水公司表示，今年仍看好中国股市。此前，中国股市的上涨助推其在岸对冲基金在2025年实现45%的收益，创下至少五年来的最佳表现。【原文：Bridgewater Associates said it is still bullish on Chinese stocks this year, after the local market’s rally helped its onshore hedge fund post a 45% gain in 2025, the best performance in at least five years.】

item.title: 英国12月通胀率涨幅超预期
拉里·芬克考虑将世界经济论坛会议从达沃斯迁至都柏林或底特律
item.description: 世界经济论坛临时联席主席拉里·芬克正公开考虑为该旗舰活动更换举办地，将每年一月的年会移出瑞士。【原文：Larry Fink, the interim co-chief of the World Economic Forum, is openly musing about a venue change for the flagship event that would take the annual January meeting outside of Switzerland.】

item.title: 南非央行行长预计2026年通胀率将维持在3%左右
item.description: 南非央行行长莱塞贾·卡尼亚戈表示，该行新设定的3%通胀目标已助力国家进入低通胀环境，他乐观预计今年通胀率将维持在该水平附近。【原文：South African central bank Governor Lesetja Kganyago said its new 3% target has helped the country enter a low-inflation environment and he is optimistic that it will hover around that level throughout this year.】

item.title: 为何投资者担忧日本债券市场
item.description: 日本债券的收益率曾一度如此之低，以至于成为全球债务市场的某种锚点，给世界各地政府的借贷成本施加下行压力。如今，这种情况已不复存在。【原文：Japanese bonds used to have such low yields that they acted as a kind of anchor for the global debt market, adding downward pressure on government borrowing costs the world over. No longer.】

item.title: 南非蓬勃发展的40亿美元美容市场成为零售商的关键战场
item.description: 南非40亿美元的美容市场正迅速成为零售商们争夺的关键战场，这些企业正面临经济疲软、消费者信心低迷以及竞争日益激烈的困境。【原文：South Africa’s $4 billion beauty market is fast becoming a key battleground for retailers grappling with a sluggish economy, weak consumer confidence and intensifying competition.】

item.title: 黑石集团据称正考虑为PGP Glass筹备5亿美元印度IPO
item.description: 知情人士透露，黑石集团正考虑为印度玻璃包装制造商PGP Glass Pvt.在孟买进行首次公开募股，该交易最高可筹集5亿美元。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is considering an initial public offering for Indian glass packaging maker PGP Glass Pvt. in Mumbai that could raise as much as $500 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 菲律宾将解除对Grok的禁令，此前xAI承诺采取安全保障措施
item.description: 菲律宾周三表示，在科技亿万富翁埃隆·马斯克的公司承诺移除允许创建色情内容的功能后，将恢复对Grok人工智能系统的访问权限。【原文：The Philippines said on Wednesday that it will restore access to the Grok artificial intelligence system after the company of tech billionaire Elon Musk promised to remove features that allow for creation of pornographic content.】

item.title: 孟加拉国央行行长称大选后经济将反弹
item.description: 孟加拉国央行行长表示，只要这个南亚国家的权力交接保持和平，该国经济将在下月全国大选后迅速复苏。【原文：Bangladesh’s economy is poised for a quick rebound following next month’s national election provided the transition of power in the South Asian nation remains peaceful, according to the head of the country’s central bank.】

item.title: 中国股市逆势上扬，科技股押注升温抵御全球抛售潮
item.description: 周三，中国股市逆势上扬，抵御了全球市场的回调。市场对北京方面加强推动技术自主的乐观情绪，盖过了对地缘政治不确定性加剧的担忧。【原文：Chinese stocks defied a pullback in global markets Wednesday, as optimism about Beijing’s stronger push to achieve technology self-reliance eclipsed concerns over rising geopolitical uncertainties.】

item.title: 莱纳斯寻求与美国谈判稀土价格下限协议
item.description: 莱纳斯稀土有限公司正试图与美国国防部达成协议，为其供应产品争取政府支持的最低价格保障，类似于去年美国一家主要生产商获得的待遇。【原文：Lynas Rare Earths Ltd. is trying to secure a deal with the US Department of Defense to get government-backed price floors for its supplies, similar to those granted to a major US producer last year.】

item.title: 三头债券怪兽重返东京
item.description:
自卫队的暴行正从格陵兰蔓延至美国。 

【原文：

The rampage of the vigilantes is running through Greenland to the US. 

】

item.title: 印尼央行行长罕见在利率决议前被召见总统府
item.description: 印尼央行行长佩里·瓦尔吉约周三被召至总统府商讨政策协调事宜，当时该国货币汇率正创下历史新低。此次罕见会晤发生在央行即将决定利率政策前的数小时。【原文：Bank Indonesia Governor Perry Warjiyo was summoned to the presidential palace Wednesday to discuss policy coordination as the country’s currency hits a record low, a rare meeting held just hours before the central bank is set to decide on interest rates.】

item.title: 据称百利特考虑出售香港内衣泳装公司Hop Lun
item.description: 知情人士透露，私募股权公司百富资本正考虑对内衣和泳装制造商合伦采取多种方案，包括可能出售该公司。【原文：Platinum Equity is considering options for lingerie and swimwear maker Hop Lun, including a possible sale, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 波兰新任利率制定者将更多降息与低通胀挂钩
item.description: 波兰货币政策委员会新成员马尔钦·扎热茨基表示，若央行预测证实通胀持续放缓，波兰将重启降息。【原文：Poland will resume interest rate cuts if the central bank’s projections confirm a sustained slowdown in inflation, according to new Monetary Policy Council member Marcin Zarzecki.】
